\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{semioneside}
\usepackage[english]{babel}
\usepackage{blindtext}
\begin{document}
\section{Example}
\Blindtext[3]
\renewcommand{\leftpagecontent}{
 \begin{figure}
   \centering
   \rule{4cm}{2cm}
   \caption{A picture.}
   \label{fig:picA}
 \end{figure}
}
\Blindtext[3]
A reference to figure~\ref{fig:picB} on p.~\pageref{fig:picB}.
\renewcommand{\leftpagecontent}{
 \begin{figure}
   \centering
   \rule{3cm}{2cm}
   \caption{A second picture.}
   \label{fig:picB}
 \end{figure}
 \begin{figure}
   \centering
   \rule{4cm}{5cm}
   \caption{A third picture.}
   \label{fig:picC}
 \end{figure}
}
\Blindtext[6]
A reference to figure~\ref{fig:picA} on p.~\pageref{fig:picA}
\semionesideoff
\end{document}
\endinput
